channel.title: seniors on Charleston Community Church
channel.description: Recent content in seniors on Charleston Community Church

item.title: Date of next Seniors' Lunch: 6th September 2023
item.author: office@charleston-church.org (Charleston Community Church)
item.description: You are warmly welcomed to the Seniors' Lunch—a delightful event designed exclusively for individuals aged 60 and above! Join us for a heartwarming afternoon filled with good food, meaningful connections, and a vibrant sense of community.

item.title: Seniors' Lunch Club
item.author: office@charleston-church.org (Charleston Community Church)
item.description: Come join in if you’re over 60. We meet the first Wednesday of every month.
